author: glasser
msg: We haven't completely fixed Issue #2705 yet: we still need
to deal with preserving history of copies into a copied-from-unreadable
directory.  Add ### comments and an XFailing test.
(copy_with_mod_from_unreadable_dir): Copy a file from somewhere readable
into the copied directory, and expect the log to reflect that.
(add_subdir): Add some ### comments noting that we may be losing some

author: glasser
msg: Fix issue #2705 (mostly): make sure that copies from unreadable directories
which have local modifications does not break svn_repos_replay.
(add_subdir): Take the changed_paths hash as a parameter.  Get all
information about the files to add (contents, properties, children,
checksum) from the target root, not the source root.  Clear any
path that we process from the changed_paths hash.
(path_driver_cb_func): If the value in the changed_paths hash has been
cleared (by add_subdir), do nothing.  Pass the changed_paths hash
(copy_with_mod_from_unreadable_dir): Add a directory and a file and
delete a file inside the copied directory, in addition to tweaking

author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r23204, fixing breakage in repos_diff.c, and tweaking
"subpool", as it's managed by our edit baton.
(switch_external): Add inline comment asking why we don't pass a
